name: Tower AR
description:
Tower AR is a tower defense game where you are fighting with waves of enemies trying to protect the last island with a blue crystal.

Tower AR features Augmented Reality mode, where you can place the game world on your desk, a floor or any other flat surface. You can even make enemies to be your size!

- Build turrets on top of towers.
- Upgrade them to shoot further and take more damage.
- Fix turrets as they wear over time.
- Sell them to replace with different type.
- Enjoy Campaign mode: progress through levels, earn stars and beat your own time.

No In-App Purchase! No ads! Pay & play!

There is also normal mode available in case you don't want to experience AR or your device is not yet supporting it. Augmented Reality is available on iOS 11 and above and iPhone SE / 6s, iPad (2017) or iPad Pro and newer.
